lead_paragraph: The attack on Sunday apparently targeted the father of two prominent officials in Nangarhar Province.

byline.contributor: Khalid Alokozay contributed reporting from Jalalabad, Afghanistan, and Ahmad Shakib from Kabul.

headline.print_headline: Suicide Attack Kills at Least 13 in Eastern Afghanistan
headline.main: Suicide Attack Kills at Least 13 in Afghanistan

snippet: The attack on Sunday apparently targeted the father of two prominent officials in Nangarhar Province.
abstract: Suicide bomber strikes home of tribal leader Malik Usman Shinwari in Jalalabad, Afghanistan, killing at least 13 people and wounding Shinwari; attack appears to be aimed at two of Shinwari's sons, who are prominent officials in Nangarhar Province, but they are unharmed; Taliban and Islamic State are active in area but have not claimed responsibility for attack.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
